conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric conversion with clear wall geometry and depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have consistent height and thickness; clear isometric projection; no distortion.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room layout is exceptionally faithful to the 2D plan. Door swings and window placements mirror the source drawing accurately.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement (beds, dining, sofas) corresponds exactly to the 2D symbols. Scale and orientation are correct.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering, clear distinction between materials, and high visibility of internal spaces.

detected_errors.description: Minor omission of specific plumbing fixtures in one of the secondary bathrooms.

summary: An highly accurate and geometrically faithful 3D isometric conversion that meticulously follows the provided 2D architectural layout.
